FuncDef: This command is used to create, delete, or modify policer control policies. Thepolicer-control-policycontrols the aggregate bandwidth available to a set of child policers. Once created, the policy can be applied to ingress or egress SAPs. The policy can also be applied to the ingress or egress context of a sub-profile.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the policer control policy name. Each policer control policy name must be unique and adhere to the system policy ASCII naming requirements. If the defined policy name already exists, the system enters that policy s context for editing purposes. If policy-name does not exist, the system attempts to create a policy with the specified name.
